no_arguments: Sorry, but the c!store command expects 1 or 2 arguments. Please see c!help for more details.
no_item_nopeeking: Sorry, but I either could not find the {1} card in the database, or you do not have it. Make sure that you spelled it right!
no_item: Sorry, but I could not find the {1} card in the database. Make sure that you spelled it right!
dont_have: Sorry, but you don't have the **{1}** card in your inventory.
not_enough: Sorry, but you do not have enough **{1}** cards in your inventory.
confirm_message: <@{1}>, do you want to put your {2} **{3}** card{2s} into storage? This cannot be undone. Click the Yes button to confirm and No to deny.
reaction_dont_have: An error has occured. Please make sure that you still have the card in your inventory!
reaction_not_enough: An error has occured. Please make sure that you still have enough **{1}** cards in your inventory!
reaction_stopped: <@{1}> has successfully stopped the storage of {2} **{3}** card{4s}.
